mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id,c.user_id,c.commodity_id,c.sum_count, i.price,i.item_commodity_name,g.origin_path as avatarImag,i.free_shipping_num,i.coupons_list,i.status,i.tag_list, ii.item_id,c.commodity_spec from item_cart as c LEFT JOIN item_commodity_info as i on c.commodity_id=i.commodity_id JOIN item_info as ii on ii.item_id=i.item_id join image as g on g.image_id=i.avatar_imag WHERE c.user_id=#{userId} order by c.create_time desc
SELECT COUNT(*) from item_cart as c LEFT JOIN item_commodity_info as i on c.commodity_id=i.commodity_id JOIN item_info as ii on ii.item_id=i.item_id WHERE c.user_id=#{userId}
